summary: Completed frontend testing of iteration 10 features. All requested features working correctly: Public booking page with team member selection and time slots, Calendar page with Day/Week/Month views and team avatars, Team page with branded delete dialog.
passed_tests: Step 1: Service selection shows 4 services with prices
Step 2: Team member selection with avatars (Any available + individual members)
Step 2: Time slots appear when date is selected (15 slots found)
Step 3: Client details form with booking summary
Step 3: Shows selected team member in summary
Complete booking flow works - booking confirmed successfully
Calendar page has Day/Week/Month view tabs
Calendar Day view shows team member columns with avatars
Calendar Week view shows days with booking counts
Calendar Month view shows full month with bookings
Calendar header has team member avatars that link to /team
Team page shows 8 team members in table format
Team page has branded delete confirmation dialog (NOT browser confirm)
Delete dialog has: red trash icon, title, subtitle, Cancel/Remove buttons
Team members sorted by newest first
critical_code_review_comments: PublicBookingPage.jsx: Well-structured 3-step booking flow with team member selection
CalendarPage.jsx: Clean implementation of Day/Week/Month views with team member columns
TeamPage.jsx: Branded delete dialog properly implemented with custom modal overlay
seed_data_creation: Created test booking during testing (Test Customer, testcustomer@example.com, Haircut & Style, Feb 10 2026 09:00)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 10 features verified working: 1) Public booking page at /book/{businessId} has team member selection with avatars and time slots. 2) Calendar page has Day/Week/Month tabs with team avatars in header linking to /team. 3) Team page uses branded delete dialog (custom modal, not browser confirm). Test credentials: testuser@example.com / password123. Business ID: 3edbbbc1-730a-494e-9626-1a0a5e6309ef

public_booking_page.step_2_team_selection: Team members with avatars (Any available + 6 individual members)
public_booking_page.step_2_time_slots: 15 time slots displayed when date selected
public_booking_page.step_3_client_details: Name, email, phone fields with booking summary

calendar_page.day_view: Team member columns with avatars and time grid
calendar_page.week_view: 7-day view with booking counts per day
calendar_page.month_view: Full month calendar with booking cards
calendar_page.team_avatars_header: Colored avatars with +N indicator, links to /team
